code: import{getAuth,onAuthStateChanged,createUserWithEmailAndPassword,signInWithEmailAndPassword,signOut as fbSignOut}from"firebase/auth";import{app}from"./firebase";var auth=getAuth(app);export var createUser=function createUser(email,password){createUserWithEmailAndPassword(auth,email,password).then(function(userCredential){var user=userCredential.user;console.log(user);}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);});};export var signIn=function signIn(email,password){signInWithEmailAndPassword(auth,email,password).catch(function(error){console.log(error);});};export var listenToUserChange=function listenToUserChange(userChange){return onAuthStateChanged(auth,function(user){userChange(user);console.log(user);if(user){var uid=user.uid;}else{}});};export var signOut=function signOut(){return fbSignOut(auth);};
